description: My cousin worked at some super advanced laboratory and he told me it was crazy fortified.  We should go there and join up with them.
//: Update Origins to match background traits once that part is built.

dialogue.describe: We need to find somewhere safe and I bet a well defended government factory will be safe.
dialogue.offer: I hope you decide to help me find a safe place.
dialogue.accepted: Thank you.  Once you've found it come back and get me.
dialogue.rejected: You don't have to be mean about not being willing to help.
dialogue.advice: I've told you what I can remember of how to get there.
dialogue.success: I guess my cousin didn't make it and we won't be allowed inside.
dialogue.success_lie: I'm glad to hear they are fine.  Why haven't they been by then?
dialogue.failure: At least you came back with your life…

description: When I got to my local evacuation gathering point I'd missed the last bus but they'd left a map with directions for any stragglers.
